name: Data Collection Methods
description: Techniques for gathering raw intelligence from multiple sources.

cards.title: Open Source Intelligence (OSINT) Techniques
cards.description: Gathering intelligence from publicly available sources.
bulletpoints: Use advanced search operators for deep web intelligence gathering
Monitor social media for emerging threat indicators
Validate sources and detect misinformation or disinformation
Utilize metadata analysis on leaked documents for deeper insights
Leverage public records, domain lookups, and WHOIS searches for entity tracking

cards.title: Human Intelligence (HUMINT) Collection
cards.description: Using interpersonal sources to acquire intelligence.
bulletpoints: Build and manage informant networks
Use psychological techniques to elicit information covertly
Assess the credibility and reliability of human sources
Apply tradecraft techniques to protect identities and maintain secrecy
Establish rapport and gain access to insider information

cards.title: Signals Intelligence (SIGINT) Collection
cards.description: Intercepting and analyzing electronic communications and signals.
bulletpoints: Intercept radio, cellular, and satellite communications
Analyze network traffic for covert transmissions
Use frequency scanning tools for detecting unauthorized broadcasts
Decrypt and analyze encrypted communications
Employ data packet analysis techniques for cyber threat intelligence

cards.title: Imagery Intelligence (IMINT) Collection
cards.description: Using visual imagery for intelligence analysis.
bulletpoints: Utilize satellite and aerial imagery for reconnaissance
Analyze geospatial metadata for location intelligence
Detect changes in terrain and infrastructure for pattern analysis
Employ AI-assisted image recognition for anomaly detection
Use thermal and infrared imaging for nighttime and obscured environments

cards.title: Measurement and Signature Intelligence (MASINT)
cards.description: Collecting intelligence through scientific analysis of signatures and emissions.
bulletpoints: Analyze electromagnetic emissions for covert communication detection
Use chemical and radiological detection for nuclear threat assessment
Employ acoustic and seismic sensors for underground activity monitoring
Detect and analyze environmental changes for WMD detection
Leverage hyperspectral imaging for material composition analysis

cards.title: Cyber Intelligence (CYBINT) Collection
cards.description: Collecting intelligence through cyber-based sources and networks.
bulletpoints: Monitor dark web forums and marketplaces for threat actors
Use honeypots to lure and analyze cyber adversaries
Analyze malware behavior for attribution and defense
Track cryptocurrency transactions for illicit financial activities
Leverage botnet monitoring to identify coordinated cyberattacks

cards.title: Geospatial Intelligence (GEOINT) Collection
cards.description: Gathering intelligence through geospatial analysis and mapping.
bulletpoints: Analyze GPS metadata from images and videos for location tracking
Use LiDAR and 3D mapping for urban intelligence operations
Integrate geospatial intelligence with social media monitoring
Detect military movements through geospatial pattern analysis
Employ crowdsource mapping techniques for real-time situational awareness

cards.title: Financial Intelligence (FININT) Collection
cards.description: Tracking financial transactions and illicit financial networks.
bulletpoints: Analyze banking transactions for money laundering patterns
Track offshore accounts and shell companies for illicit activity
Monitor cryptocurrency transactions for darknet market activity
Use AI-driven financial forensics for fraud detection
Identify economic indicators for intelligence on national stability

cards.title: Social Media Intelligence (SOCMINT) Collection
cards.description: Extracting intelligence from social media platforms.
bulletpoints: Monitor trends and sentiment analysis for real-time intelligence
Track terrorist recruitment and radicalization patterns
Analyze network graphs for identifying key influencers
Use geotagged posts to track movements and events
Detect coordinated disinformation campaigns

cards.title: Medical Intelligence (MEDINT) Collection
cards.description: Gathering intelligence on medical and biosecurity threats.
bulletpoints: Monitor epidemiological data for biosecurity threats
Analyze pharmaceutical supply chain disruptions
Track bioweapon-related research and facilities
Identify emerging health crises through patient data trends
Assess national healthcare infrastructure for strategic planning
